main event: Witnesses observed a silver elliptical object hovering over a river in Lewisburg-Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes, The object was estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter and 500 feet above the ground, The sky was clear with a bright moon and visible stars, Witnesses reported no lights, noise, or exhaust from the object, The object suddenly accelerated and disappeared to the southwest.
